content: As mentioned in the call today, HL7 Finland had a workshop on businessmodels, reimbursement, and accreditation of digital health. The recording can be found in https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-Tam2KYLWw.
I also mentioned the N!P project in the call (also discussed in the above recording), https://nordicinteroperability.com/general/nordic-digital-health-platform/
Sweden also has some activity on app accreditation, I think: https://ssci.se/sv/event/kvalitetss-kring-av-h-lsoappar

The new workgroup in ISO/TC 215/ I mentioned is called WG 11 Personalized digital health. I believe they work with health app quality issues, but else I'm not sure what the goals/plans are yet, but I would guess (hope?) something around IPA use cases, usability, security etc.

We (The Norwegian Directorate of eHealth) will make sure at least one Norwegian follows WG 11.
